nodes.name: Sticky Note
nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Store incoming WhatsApp user messages in a Google Sheet
To receive user messages, you need to add a WhatsApp Trigger node. In the credentials section provide an App ID and an App secret. These are obtained from the Meta Developers Portal, Basic App settings screen

After the credentials are added, copy the trigger URL and enter it into the 'Callback URL' field in the WhatsApp configuration window in the Meta Developer portal.

Once the trigger receives a payload from WhatsApp, we check if the incoming data contains a message and add a new row with user data and message text in [Google Sheet]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

WhatsApp trigger also receives status notifications (i.e. message sent, message read etc.), so we ignore such notifications in this workflow.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Reply to the user via WhatsApp
WhatsApp allows sending automatic messages **with custom text** via bots only within the 24h time frame after the last incoming user message.

After the user sends a message to the WhatsApp bot, a row is added to the [Google Sheet]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }} with the Status 'New'

Type something in the `ReplyText` column and change the Status to 'Ready'.
In a few minutes, n8n timer will fetch all 'Ready' replies from the Google Sheet and send them one by one to the recipients

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# WhatsApp business bot

## Overview
Automated workflow: WhatsApp business bot. This workflow integrates 11 different services: filter, stickyNote, wait, googleSheetsTrigger, scheduleTrigger. It contains 19 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 19
- **Node Types**: 11
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Sent notification  template**: whatsApp
- **WhatsApp Trigger**: whatsAppTrigger
- **Is message?**: if
- **Schedule Trigger**: scheduleTrigger
- **Loop Over Items**: splitInBatches
- **Get new answers**: googleSheets
- **Reply to the user**: whatsApp
- **Update message status**: googleSheets
- **Wait 1 sec**: wait
- **New message from the user**: googleSheets
- ... and 9 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
